overview: Fay Weston (Jinx Falkenburg), a radio singer of no consequence, pretends to be the daughter of a recently deceased Broadway stage star in order to hoodwink Broadway play producer in starring her in a planned-show that is a tribute to her supposed mother.
tagline: SING AND DANCE OUT THOSE KINKS WITH THAT JOYOUS MINX...JINX!
title: She Has What It Takes
